name: generate-workgroup-id
description: Generates a WorkGroupID following the KCv2.0 convention [type]-YYYYMMDD-HHMMSS.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: One of feat, fix, refactor, issue

actions.code:
import datetime
allowed = {'feat', 'fix', 'refactor', 'issue'}
wg_type = inputs['type']
if wg_type not in allowed:
    raise ValueError(f'Invalid type {wg_type!r}, expected one of {sorted(allowed)}')
timestamp = datetime.datetime.utcnow().strftime('%Y%m%d-%H%M%S')
outputs['workgroup_id'] = f'{wg_type}-{timestamp}'
